timeline.message:
This PR fixes multiple issues
- Singlepartition queries going to gateway instead of directMode in directMode
- readMany not working in gateway Mode
- QueryMetricsUtils failing to parse request charge in a non US locale

timeline.author: FabianMeiswinkel

timeline.bodyText: Just to double-check my understanding is correct - instead of changing the place where we were Parsing the Double you decided to normalize the locale here because for all other content where we parse floating point numbers the content is created by our backend and we own the locale/formatting, correct?
timeline.author: FabianMeiswinkel

timeline.message: Fixing failing test. Since one of the test changes the locale, that might have caused the string format in ParallelDocumentQueryTest to use different locale and fail parsing.
